short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Foxy Tab Will Let You Customize Your New Tab Experience With A New Set of Backgrounds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wanted to customize your new tab experience with a new set of backgrounds & a powerful search engine like Bing? Now here at Foxy Tab you will be able to change your background to your favorite background and even your Top Sites intact so it’s a clean transition to our extension.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Foxy Tab extension and setting Chrome™ newtab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. search will be powered by Microsoft Bing.
